00088  struct ZIP_API CInfo
00089  {
00090   
00095   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE   m_uEndOffset;
00096 
00101   ZIP_VOLUME_TYPE m_uLastVolume;
00102   ZIP_VOLUME_TYPE m_uVolumeWithCD;  
00103   ZIP_INDEX_TYPE m_uVolumeEntriesNo; 
00104   ZIP_INDEX_TYPE m_uEntriesNumber; 
00105 
00110   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uSize;
00111 
00117   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uOffset;
00118 
00119 
00123   bool m_bInArchive;
00124 
00125  private:
00126   friend class CZipCentralDir;  
00127   void Init()
00128   {
00129    m_iReference = 1;
00130 #ifdef _ZIP_USE_LOCKING
00131    m_mutex.Open();
00132 #endif
00133    m_pCompare = GetCZipStrCompFunc(ZipPlatform::GetSystemCaseSensitivity());
00134    m_bCaseSensitive = false;
00135    m_bFindFastEnabled = false;
00136    m_pszComment.Release();
00137    // initialize ( necessary when using 64 bits - we are copying only 4 bytes in Read()) 
00138    m_bInArchive = false;
00139    m_uEndOffset = 0;
00140    m_uLastVolume = 0;
00141    m_uVolumeWithCD = 0;
00142    m_uVolumeEntriesNo = 0;
00143    m_uEntriesNumber = 0;
00144    m_uSize = 0;  
00145    m_uOffset = 0;
00146    m_iLastIndexAdded = ZIP_FILE_INDEX_UNSPECIFIED;
00147   }
00148   bool CheckIfOK_1()
00149   {
00150    return (m_uEndOffset >= m_uOffset + m_uSize);
00151   }
00152   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE CalculateBytesBeforeZip()
00153   {
00154    return m_uEndOffset - m_uSize - m_uOffset;
00155   }
00156   bool CheckIfOK_2()
00157   {
00158    return (m_uSize || !m_uEntriesNumber) && (m_uEntriesNumber || !m_uSize);
00159   }
00160   
00170   bool NeedsZip64() const
00171   {
00172    return m_uLastVolume >= USHRT_MAX || m_uVolumeWithCD >= USHRT_MAX || m_uVolumeEntriesNo >= USHRT_MAX || m_uEntriesNumber >= USHRT_MAX || m_uSize >= UINT_MAX || m_uOffset >= UINT_MAX;
00173   }
00174 
00175   CZipAutoBuffer m_pszComment; 
00176 
00180   bool m_bCaseSensitive;
00181 
00185   bool m_bFindFastEnabled; 
00186 
00190   ZIP_INDEX_TYPE m_iLastIndexAdded;
00191 
00192  private:
00196   ZIPSTRINGCOMPARE m_pCompare;
00197   int m_iReference;
00198 #ifdef _ZIP_USE_LOCKING
00199   ZipArchiveLib::CZipMutex m_mutex;
00200 #endif
00201  };

00390  ZIP_INDEX_TYPE GetFindFastIndex(ZIP_INDEX_TYPE uFindFastIndex)const
00391  {
00392   if (!IsValidIndex(uFindFastIndex) || !m_pInfo->m_bFindFastEnabled)
00393    return ZIP_FILE_INDEX_NOT_FOUND;
00394   
00395   return (*m_pFindArray)[(ZIP_ARRAY_SIZE_TYPE)uFindFastIndex]->m_uIndex;
00396  }

00624  static int CompareHeaders(const void *pArg1, const void *pArg2)
00625  {
00626   CZipFileHeader* pw1 = *(CZipFileHeader**)pArg1;
00627   CZipFileHeader* pw2 = *(CZipFileHeader**)pArg2;
00628   if (pw1 == pw2)
00629    return 0;
00630 
00631   if (pw1->m_uVolumeStart == pw2->m_uVolumeStart)
00632   {
00633    if (pw1->m_uOffset < pw2->m_uOffset)
00634     return -1;
00635    else if (pw1->m_uOffset > pw2->m_uOffset)
00636     return 1;
00637     ASSERT(FALSE);
00638 
00639 
00640    // two files with the same offsets in the same volume???
00641    CZipException::Throw(CZipException::badZipFile);
00642    return 0; // just for the compiler comfort (and discomfort of another)
00643   }
00644   else if (pw1->m_uVolumeStart < pw2->m_uVolumeStart)
00645    return -1;
00646   else // if (pw1->m_uVolumeStart > pw2->m_uVolumeStart)
00647    return 1;  
00648  }
00649 
00650 #if _MSC_VER > 1000
00651  #pragma warning( pop )
00652 #endif
00653 
00654  static int CompareFindFastCollate(const void* pArg1, const void* pArg2)
00655  {
00656   CZipFindFast* pHeader1 = *(CZipFindFast**)pArg1;
00657   CZipFindFast* pHeader2 = *(CZipFindFast**)pArg2;  
00658   return pHeader1->m_pHeader->GetFileName().Collate(pHeader2->m_pHeader->GetFileName());
00659  }
00660 
00661  static int CompareFindFastCollateNoCase(const void* pArg1, const void* pArg2)
00662  {
00663   CZipFindFast* pHeader1 = *(CZipFindFast**)pArg1;
00664   CZipFindFast* pHeader2 = *(CZipFindFast**)pArg2;  
00665   return pHeader1->m_pHeader->GetFileName().CollateNoCase(pHeader2->m_pHeader->GetFileName());
00666  }

00682  void ClearFindFastArray()
00683  {
00684   ZIP_ARRAY_SIZE_TYPE uCount = m_pFindArray->GetSize();
00685   for (ZIP_ARRAY_SIZE_TYPE i = 0; i < uCount; i++)
00686    delete (*m_pFindArray)[i];
00687   m_pFindArray->RemoveAll();
00688  }

00718  int CompareElement(LPCTSTR lpszFileName, ZIP_INDEX_TYPE uIndex) const
00719  {
00720   return ((*m_pFindArray)[(ZIP_ARRAY_SIZE_TYPE)uIndex]->m_pHeader->GetFileName().*(m_pInfo->m_pCompare))(lpszFileName);
00721  }
